titleStmt.title: The summe of sacred diuinitie briefly & methodically propounded : more largly & cleerely handled and explaned / published by John Downame ...
titleStmt.author: Downame, John, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Engraved t.p. with title within ornamental border.
Numerous errors in paging; p. 257-266, 443-444 lacking in number only.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
